---
title: "Day 9"
---

[Day 9 challenge](https://adventofcode.com/2024/day/9)

Setup:

```{r setup_day09}
library("tidyverse")

fn1 <- function(data_in) {
  ans <- str_sub(data_in, 1, 10)
}
```

Part1 example:

```{r day09_part1_example_A}
ans <- fn1(read_lines("../data/day09_01_example_A.txt"))
print(cat("Part1 example A: ", ans, "\n"))
```


```{r day09_part1_example_B}
ans <- fn1(read_lines("../data/day09_01_example_B.txt"))
print(cat("Part1 example B: ", ans, "\n"))
```

Part1:

```{r day09_part1}
ans <- fn1(read_lines("../data/day09_01.txt"))
print(cat("Part1: ", ans, "\n"))
```
